page.title: 02Our School - Sheerness
page.content: Our school, Lady Anne Cheyne {Middle School}For Girls, shares the same site as Sir Thomas Cheyne Middle {School}For Boys and Richmond Street Primary School. There is a three tier system of{education}on Sheppey. The school was built in 1931 with the main part of the building being two storeys brick and a single storey of wooden{buildings}around a quadrangle. It was built as a girls secondary school and became a middle school during reorganisation in 1970. Temporary additions in the form of Horsa huts are still in use today. An assembly hall was added in the mid sixties to serve also as a gymnasium. The land on which the school is built is below sea level.
